comments.author: Felix Meschberger
comments.body: After moving the DTD, the testcases fail. Adapting the testcases with the updated URI.

comments.author: Felix Meschberger
comments.body:
Actually, I removed the DOCTYPE declaration alltogether, because each time the descriptors where loaded the DTD is accessed which slows down the test cases considerably.

Fixed in Rev. 608374

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Good point, thanks!

It's good to have the DTD available online for validation and documentation, but there's little need for it to actually be referenced by live configuration files.

description: The jackrabbit-ocm DTD from jackrabbit-ocm/src/dtd should be made available for reference on the Jackrabbit web site.
